org.ctoolkit.restapi.client

Interface UploadMediaRequestProvider<T>


  • public interface UploadMediaRequestProvider<T>
    The request wrapper provider in form of single instance which can later ask to upload given content of the concrete resource.
    Author:
    Aurel Medvegy

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SingleUploadMediaRequest<T> upload(byte[] array, int offset, int length, String type)
      Creates a media request with media content to be uploaded.
      SingleUploadMediaRequest<T> upload(byte[] array, String type)
      Creates a media request with media content to be uploaded.
      SingleUploadMediaRequest<T> upload(File file, String type)
      Creates a media request with media content to be uploaded.
      SingleUploadMediaRequest<T> upload(InputStream stream, String type)
      Creates a media request with media content to be uploaded, content taken from given input stream.

    • Method Detail

      • upload

        SingleUploadMediaRequest<T> upload(File file,
                                 String type)
        Creates a media request with media content to be uploaded. It generates repeatable input stream based on the content of given file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to read content from
        type - the content type or null for none
        Returns:
        the upload media request instance with associated resource and media content

      • upload

        SingleUploadMediaRequest<T> upload(InputStream stream,
                                 String type)
        Creates a media request with media content to be uploaded, content taken from given input stream. This should only be used for streams that can not be re-opened and retried.
        Parameters:
        stream - the input stream to read content from
        type - the content type or null for none
        Returns:
        the upload media request instance with associated resource and media content

      • upload

        SingleUploadMediaRequest<T> upload(byte[] array,
                                 String type)
        Creates a media request with media content to be uploaded. It generates repeatable input stream based on the content of given byte array.
        Parameters:
        array - the byte array content
        type - the content type or null for none
        Returns:
        the upload media request instance with associated resource and media content

      • upload

        SingleUploadMediaRequest<T> upload(byte[] array,
                                 int offset,
                                 int length,
                                 String type)
        Creates a media request with media content to be uploaded. It generates repeatable input stream based on the content of given byte array.
        Parameters:
        array - the byte array content
        offset - starting offset into the byte array
        length - of bytes to read from byte array
        type - the content type or null for none
        Returns:
        the upload media request instance with associated resource and media content
